cast.name: 乔治·斯帕特尔斯 George Spartels
克里斯·萨德里纳 Chris Sadrinna
保罗·莫库利奥 Paul Mercurio
布伦丹·考威尔 Brendan Cowell

writer.name: 斯图尔特·贝亚蒂耶 Stuart Beattie

introduction: A champion high school rugby player (Russell Page) has a secret desire to be a ballet dancer, having spent 11 years in ballet school. Seizing an opportunity to audition for a local company's presentation of "Romeo and Juliet", he nonetheless fears what will happen to his reputation if the other kids in his school find out. Adding the practices to his already burgeoning schedule quickly starts to create problems with his friends (Radha Mitchell, Martin Henderson), his teachers, his coach, his play director (Paul Mercurio), and his ballet partner (Rebecca Yates). Of course, it all comes together on the stage of the Sydney Opera House. Written by John Sacksteder {jsackste@bellsouth.net} @imdb
